TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmFunctionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EdmFunctionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EdmFunctionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 一个特性，当该特性应用于某方法时，指示该方法是概念模型或存储模型中某个函数的代理。

span.span: An attribute that, when applied to a method, indicates that the method is a proxy for a function in the conceptual model or storage model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接到另一个函数的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 方法。An links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. 例如，该属性可以用于将 CLR 方法映射到由存储提供程序公开的函数、 用户定义函数在数据库中，或在概念模型中的用户定义函数。For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. To Entities 查询，可以从 LINQ 调用具有此属性的方法。Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries. 若要使用要将 CLR 方法映射到函数，必须满足以下：To use an to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true: - CLR 方法的返回类型必须与映射到函数的返回类型兼容。The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function. - CLR 方法的参数类型必须与映射到函数的参数类型兼容。The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function. 有关兼容性类型的信息，请参阅[概念模型类型 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4)。For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接到另一个函数的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 方法。An links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function. 例如，该属性可以用于将 CLR 方法映射到由存储提供程序公开的函数、 用户定义函数在数据库中，或在概念模型中的用户定义函数。For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model. To Entities 查询，可以从 LINQ 调用具有此属性的方法。Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries. 若要使用要将 CLR 方法映射到函数，必须满足以下：To use an to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true: - CLR 方法的返回类型必须与映射到函数的返回类型兼容。The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function. - CLR 方法的参数类型必须与映射到函数的参数类型兼容。The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function. 有关兼容性类型的信息，请参阅[概念模型类型 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4)。For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).
